text: Melt the olive oil, coconut oil, beeswax and carnauba wax in a double boiler. The heat should be no warmer than medium. Stir as the oils and waxes melt.  Remove the melted mixture from the heat.  Pour in the distilled water and mix well using a large wooden spoon. Continue mixing until you get a strong, creamy and thick mixture. Add the grapefruit-seed extract. This acts as a preservative. Stir in your choice of essential oil to fragrance the polish. Mix in well. Put into a glass container and leave to one side. Leave the polish to turn solid and add the lid to the container for storage. Use as needed to keep your wooden furniture shining and well cared for.
